channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office

item.title: CVE-2023-5042|2023-09-20T11:03:34.796Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to insecure folder permissions. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 40713.

item.title: CVE-2023-48677|2023-12-12T08:33:17.191Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to DLL hijacking vulnerability. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 40901.

item.title: CVE-2023-41743|2023-08-31T19:14:03.530Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to insecure driver communication port permissions. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 40278, Acronis Agent (Windows) before build 31637, Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows) before build 35979.

item.title: CVE-2023-44208|2023-10-04T11:47:43.666Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure and manipulation due to missing authorization. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 40713.
